solution_line_template: If Calvin had scored {calvin_points} points and Paislee {paislee_ratio} times as many points as Calvin, Paislee had scored {paislee_ratio}*{calvin_points}={paislee_points} points.
To have a chance of tying the game, Paislee had to score {calvin_points}-{paislee_points}=<<{calvin_points}-{paislee_points}={points_needed_to_tie}>>{points_needed_to_tie} points
